title.rendered: Human trafficking takes center stage in AMK Productions latest film – Torn From Innocence (Director’s Cut)

content.rendered:
The lost can be found. Human trafficking victims can be helped.

Human trafficking takes center stage in AMK Productions – Torn From Innocence (Director’s Cut)

LARGO, FLORIDA, USA, May 31, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The lost can be found.

Human trafficking victims can be helped.

Torn From Innocence (Director’s Cut)
2020 · 1 hr 28 min
Drama · Crime· Thriller

Written and directed by Andrew Michael Kranz

New York Inspector Jack Spencer takes on a human trafficking ring tied to the United Nations as he risks his life to save the lives of innocent young women from a life of sex slavery and human depravity.

Filmed in and around New York City/Manhattan, Torn From Innocence is a gritty seventies-style police drama that delivers action and suspense. Inspector Jack Spencer is determined to expose the UN thugs behind human trafficking. With the help of his crack police team, he delivers justice to the criminals saving many victims from a life of sex slavery and servitude.

Starring Andrew Michael Kranz, Mauricio Ovalle, Mark Havlis, Alix Maria Taulbee, and a host of New York’s finest.

Torn From Innocence (Director’s Cut) is available online at Tubi TV and other popular digital delivery platforms.

This film is meant to help increase awareness of the growing global human trafficking problem that has torn apart many lives.

AMK Productions is an independent film company founded by Andrew Michael Kranz that operates in and around Tampa Bay Florida.

Contact: amkproductions@yahoo.com

Tubi TV: https://tubitv.com/movies/724065/torn-from-innocence-director-s-cut?start=true

Andrew Kranz
AMK Productions
amkproductions@yahoo.com
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
YouTube

Torn From Innocence Trailer

You just read:

News Provided By

May 31, 2023, 13:08 GMT
